mapper.sql: id, parent_id, text, created_date, like, user_id, post_id
mapper.select: SELECT pc.id AS id, u.username AS username, u.avatar AS avatar, pc.text AS text, pc.created_date AS createdDate, pc.likes AS likes, IF(pcl.post_comment_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS thumbed FROM post_comments pc JOIN users u ON pc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_comment_id FROM post_comment_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId}) pcl ON pc.id = pcl.post_comment_id WHERE pc.post_id = #{postId} GROUP BY pc.id, u.username, u.avatar, pc.text, pc.created_date ORDER BY pc.created_date DESC
